model.world



class World;
This class describes a game world. A world contains all players and game objects (
units'').




immutable int tickIndex;



Returns:

the current game tick.






immutable int tickCount;



Returns:

the base game duration in ticks. A real game duration may be lower. Equals to 
game.tickCount
.






immutable double width;



Returns:

the world width.






immutable double height;



Returns:

the world height.






immutable Player[] players;



Returns:

all players (in random order). After each tick the player objects are recreated.






immutable Wizard[] wizards;



Returns:

visible wizards (in random order). After each tick the wizard objects are recreated.






immutable Minion[] minions;



Returns:

visible minions (in random order). After each tick the minion objects are recreated.






immutable Projectile[] projectiles;



Returns:

visible projectiles (in random order). After each tick the projectile objects are recreated.






immutable Bonus[] bonuses;



Returns:

visible bonuses (in random order). After each tick the bonus objects are recreated.






immutable Building[] buildings;



Returns:

visible buildings (in random order). After each tick the building objects are recreated.






immutable Tree[] trees;



Returns:

visible trees (in random order). After each tick the tree objects are recreated.






immutable immutable(Player) getMyPlayer();



Returns:

your player.
